remarks.format: ## Remarks 类枚举，加载每个名称和值，并将它们存储在。The class enumerates over an , loading every name and value, and storing them in a . 自定义可用。A custom can be used. 可以实例化对象，表示特定区域性的资源通过调用方法。You can instantiate a object that represents the resources of a specific culture by calling the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`dispose`参数是`true`，当前方法将释放与它以及与之关联的所有对象关联的所有资源。If the `dispose` parameter is `true`, the current method frees all the resources associated with it as well as with all objects associated with it. 如果`dispose`是`false`，当前方法释放仅资源分配给它，并忽略与之关联的任何对象。If `dispose` is `false`, the current method frees only the resources allocated to it, and ignores any objects associated with it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举器只允许读取集合中的数据。Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection. 枚举器不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置，调用将引发异常。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 在传递到集合的末尾之后，枚举数放在集合中最后一个元素后面，且调用 会返回 `false`。After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection, and calling returns `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，则调用将引发异常。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行了更改，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，则枚举数将失效，并且下一个调用或引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果在 和 之间修改集合，那么即使枚举数已经无效， 也将返回它所设置成的元素。If the collection is modified between and , will return the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 可以使用属性来访问存储在当前元素的值。You can use the property to access the value stored in the current element. 使用属性来访问当前元素的键。Use the property to access the key of the current element. 使用属性来访问当前元素的值。Use the property to access the value of the current element. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举器引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建`rs`文件`items.resources`。The following example demonstrates how to create a `rs` for the file `items.resources`. 下一步，方法用于创建为`rs`。Next, the method is used to create an for `rs`. 循环访问`rs`，并向控制台显示内容。The iterates through `rs` and displays the contents to the console. [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResourceSet.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceSet.GetEnumerator/CPP/getenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceSet.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceSet.GetEnumerator/CS/getenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceSet.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceSet.GetEnumerator/VB/getenumerator.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的值`ignoreCase`参数是`true`，使用名称"资源"的资源是等效于具有名称"资源"的资源。If the value of the `ignoreCase` parameter is `true`, a resource with the name "Resource" is equivalent to the resource with the name "resource". 但请注意，此方法始终执行不区分大小写的字符串比较使用。Note, however, that this method always performs case-insensitive string comparisons using . 优点是，此方法执行不区分大小写的字符串比较的结果是不考虑区域性的所有计算机上相同。The advantage is that results of case-insensitive string comparisons performed by this method are the same on all computers regardless of culture. 缺点是，结果不是与所有区域性的大小写规则一致。The disadvantage is that the results are not consistent with the casing rules of all cultures. 例如，土耳其语的字母表中有两个版本的实现： 一个带有圆点的字符，另一个不带点。For example, the Turkish alphabet has two versions of the character I: one with a dot and one without a dot. 在土耳其语，字符 I (Unicode 0049) 被视为不同字符 ı (Unicode 0131) 的大写版本。In Turkish, the character I (Unicode 0049) is considered the uppercase version of a different character ı (Unicode 0131). 字符 i (Unicode 0069) 被视为另一种字符 İ (Unicode 0130) 的小写形式。The character i (Unicode 0069) is considered the lowercase version of yet another character İ (Unicode 0130). 根据这些大小写规则，不区分大小写的字符串比较的字符 (Unicode 0069) i 和 I (Unicode 0049) 应失败区域性"TR-TR"（土耳其语）。According to these casing rules, a case-insensitive string comparison of the characters i (Unicode 0069) and I (Unicode 0049) should fail for the culture "tr-TR" (Turkish in Turkey). 使用`GetObject`方法替换`ignoreCase`设置为`true`，这种比较成功。Using the `GetObject` method with `ignoreCase` set to `true`, this comparison succeeds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的值`ignoreCase`参数是`true`，使用名称"资源"的资源是等效于具有名称"资源"的资源。If the value of the `ignoreCase` parameter is `true`, a resource with the name "Resource" is equivalent to the resource with the name "resource". 但请注意，此方法始终执行不区分大小写的字符串比较使用。Note, however, that this method always performs case-insensitive string comparisons using . 优点是，此方法执行不区分大小写的字符串比较的结果是不考虑区域性的所有计算机上相同。The advantage is that results of case-insensitive string comparisons performed by this method are the same on all computers regardless of culture. 缺点是，结果不是与所有区域性的大小写规则一致。The disadvantage is that the results are not consistent with the casing rules of all cultures. 例如，土耳其语的字母表中有两个版本的实现： 一个带有圆点的字符，另一个不带点。For example, the Turkish alphabet has two versions of the character I: one with a dot and one without a dot. 在土耳其语，字符 I (Unicode 0049) 被视为不同字符 ı (Unicode 0131) 的大写版本。In Turkish, the character I (Unicode 0049) is considered the uppercase version of a different character ı (Unicode 0131). 字符 i (Unicode 0069) 被视为另一种字符 İ (Unicode 0130) 的小写形式。The character i (Unicode 0069) is considered the lowercase version of yet another character İ (Unicode 0130). 根据这些大小写规则，不区分大小写的字符串比较的字符 (Unicode 0069) i 和 I (Unicode 0049) 应失败区域性"TR-TR"（土耳其语）。According to these casing rules, a case-insensitive string comparison of the characters i (Unicode 0069) and I (Unicode 0049) should fail for the culture "tr-TR" (Turkish in Turkey). 使用`GetString`方法替换`ignoreCase`设置为`true`，这种比较成功。Using the `GetString` method with `ignoreCase` set to `true`, this comparison succeeds.

span.para: 派生类的应显式调用加载中的所有资源到，通常在构造函数或延迟在第一个调用为或。但是，如果你的资源组和 IResourceReader 已有有关每个其他的信息，并具有更高效的方法来加载几个选择的资源，可以跳过此步骤。若要尽量减少工作集，编写资源的方式，它将查询请求的应用程序的资源值你 IResourceReader 设置。

Derived classes of should explicitly call to load all the resources from the into , generally either in the constructor or lazily on the first call to either or . However, if your resource set and IResourceReader already have information about each other and have a more efficient way to load just a few select resources, this step can be skipped. To minimize working set, write your resource set in such a way that it queries your IResourceReader for only the resource values requested by your application.
